meaningMnemonic: On this <radical>scooter</radical> is a <radical>child</radical> who's trying to show that his <radical>lineage</radical> is <kanji>humble</kanji>. All of the other children are going around in fancy cars or helicopters, but this one child wants to be a humble child of the people, so he scoots on a plebeian scooter.
readingMnemonic: This <kanji>humble</kanji> child is your <reading>son</reading> (そん). You don't want any child of yours flaunting his wealth and good standing in the faces of other people. You've taught them to be humble.
